presentationTable.name: Base Facts
presentationTable.description: This folder contains all the base facts like Revenue, Quantity, Target, Headcount and so on. All the metrics in this folder have the aggregation type as Sum unless explicitly specified.

presentationColumns.name: 1- Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:02 - Flat XML files Sample.F0 Base Measures.1- Revenue
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Revenue physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

presentationColumns.name: 2- Billed Quantity
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:02 - Flat XML files Sample.F0 Base Measures.2- Billed Quantity
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Billed Quantity data. Sources from Units physical column in 'Sample Revenue Fact' table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimension

presentationColumns.name: 20  Actual Unit Price
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:02 - Flat XML files Sample.F0 Base Measures.20  Actual Unit Price
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Unit Price is computed as Revenue divided by Billed Quantity
